synopsis.text:
Starish, the rising boy band from Shining Agency, has just claimed the Uta Puri Award for best new rookie group in Uta no Prince-sama: Maji Love Revolutions, following the events of Uta no Prince-sama: Maji Love 2000%. However, the competition is far from over as they, along with fellow group QUARTET NIGHT, face a new challenge: vying for a coveted spot to perform at the opening ceremonies of an international sports festival. To triumph in this fierce group-versus-group battle, it will take more than just their 2000% effort – they'll need a LOVE REVOLUTION!

In this third anime adaptation of the popular otome game Uta no☆Prince-sama♪, Starish is assigned new tasks and divided into teams, each striving to make a lasting impression on Shining Saotome to secure a place in the prestigious SSS music contest. Meanwhile, Haruka finds herself working closely with the talented members of Quartet Night. Will Starish's love revolution pave the way to stardom, or will they face the music in defeat? Only time will tell in this thrilling new chapter of Uta no Prince-sama: Maji Love Revolutions!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
